fieldDescription: If true, will just show ships instead of combat ships, DP instead of deployment points and FP instead of fleet strenght, along others.
Toggles whether the Fleet Strenght contributed by civilian ships is shown separately (if true, civilian ships will still not be counted as combat ships)
Toggles whether civilian ships are counted as ships, by default false and specifies its only combat ships
Toggles whether to display how many officers and their average level in the enemy or supporting fleets.
